chat_history.message:
Hello,
My product iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem: Address change. Error in name, but the way you described it doesn't work.
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

the customer got the name wrong.

Please send the package with the following details:

Lee Hirschel
Püttlinger Straße 56
66333 Völklingen
Deutschland
01517 0696508
leebeartea@icloud.com

Claudia from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have updated our logistics partner regarding the change in the customer's name.

Regards,
JH
